title: Did Jared Kushner Scrub His Twitter Account After Manafort Indictment?
subtitle: A baseless rumor that Jared Kushner had scrubbed his Twitter account was circulated in the wake of Paul Manafort's indictment.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Jared Kushner scrubbed his Twitter account shortly after Special Counsel Robert S. Mueller III revealed charges against three former Trump campaign officials in October 2017.
